profile:
From water damage restoration to fire cleanup, make 911 Restoration of Calgary your first call in a disaster. Our IICRC certified crew is here for you day and night, 24/7-365 days a year. We guarantee an arrival time of 45 minutes or less (notwithstanding weather conditions and safety), so you can count on immediate solutions and a swift recovery. We train every one of our technicians to meet the highest standard of service in all areas of restoration. When you call 911 Restoration, you can count on a Fresh Start. We do everything from initial response to repairs and final cleanup.

You can trust our experts to serve you with compassion. We recognize the incredible stress you’re under during an unexpected event.  Whether you’re dealing with pipe burst, sewer backups or leaks, mold problems, asbestos, smoke damage, fire, biohazard cleanup and trauma, our caring technicians know that your home or business is your greatest asset.  We will work hard to make your property new again.

911 Restoration serves both residential and commercial properties throughout Calgary and surrounding areas. We are locally owned and operated, as well as licensed, insured, and bonded. Call us today for a free visual inspection (for property owners only). We even provide a free insurance consultation and work with all providers.
services:
We remediate, asbestos, mould, sewer backups, basement floods, damages, smoke damage, etc.
We are a full service restoration company that represents and advocates for you the homeowner.

profile:
Proudly serving Calgary & area, Homeworks Restoration’s team has over 100 years combined experience in the restoration industry, our well trained and professional staff are equipped and prepared for any restoration project. We have seen it all from working on small fire restoration to full warehouse recovery.

Homeworks has the experience of working with both insurers and homeowners to navigate a claim and restore a property to pristine condition. Our 24/7 response team is sure to quickly adhere to all emergency situations.

At Homeworks our priority is always customer satisfaction, and we accomplish this one restoration project at a time.

At Homeworks our priority is always customer satisfaction, and we accomplish this one restoration project at a time by ensuring:

- We stay on top of your restoration project from initial estimate to completion
- We set and achieve solid & realistic deadlines
- We prepare & protect your home or business from the start and during the whole process.
- We clean the job site daily and leave your property organized and proper.
- We honestly & accurately price each job to prevent any hidden costs or shortcuts
- We keep constant communication to avoid surprises
